history.proof: intros x m M H. destruct H as [H1 H2]. unfold Rmax, Rabs. destruct (Rle_dec M (- m)). - apply Rabs_def1. qsimpl time: 2 use: Rmax_l. qsimpl time: 2 use: Rmax_l. + srun best use: Rge_gt_trans, Rle_ge unfold: Rgt. + scongruence use: Ropp_involutive. - apply Rabs_lt_between. split. + qauto depth: 4 l: on use: Rnot_le_lt, Ropp_involutive, Ropp_le_ge_contravar, Rle_lt_trans, Rge_le unfold: Rle. + apply H2.

exceptions.exn: In environment x, m, M : R H1 : m < x H2 : x < M r : M <= - m Unable to unify "m < x" with "x < - m".
In environment x, m, M : R H1 : m < x H2 : x < M r : M <= - m Unable to unify "?M2298 < Rmax ?M2298 ?M2299 \\/ ?M2298 = Rmax ?M2298 ?M2299" with "x < - m".
In environment H : forall x y : R, x <= Rmax x y x, m, M : R H1 : m < x H2 : x < M r : M <= - m Unable to unify "x < M" with "x < - m".
Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.
Unable to apply lemma of type "forall x y z : R, Rmax x y < z <-> x < z /\\ y < z" on hypothesis of type "~ M <= - m".

In environment H : forall x y : R, x <= Rmax x y x, m, M : R H1 : m < x H2 : x < M H3 : forall x y z : R, x < z -> y < z -> Rmax x y < z H4 : forall x y z : R, Rmax x y < z -> y < z H5 : forall x y z : R, Rmax x y < z -> x < z Unable to unify "?M2735 < Rmax ?M2735 ?M2736 \\/ ?M2735 = Rmax ?M2735 ?M2736" with "M < - m \\/ M = - m".
Wrong bullet +: Current bullet + is not finished.

original: intros x m M H. destruct H as [H1 H2]. unfold Rmax, Rabs. destruct (Rle_dec M (- m)). - apply Rabs_def1. apply H1. apply Rmax_l. apply H2. - apply Rabs_lt_between. split. + apply Rmax_Rlt in n. destruct n. apply H. + apply H2.
